full_description:
Apple Vision Pro 256GB Storage Spatial Computer VR Headset

Apple unveiled Apple Vision Pro, a ground-breaking spatial computer that allows users to remain present and socially engaged while seamlessly fusing digital material with the real environment. Apple Vision Pro presents a completely three-dimensional user interface controlled by the most natural and intuitive inputs possible users' eyes, hands, and voice creating an unlimited canvas for apps that goes beyond the limitations of a standard display. Vision Pro, the world's first spatial operating system, enables users to engage with digital information in a way that makes it feel like it is actually in their area. The breakthrough design of Apple Vision Pro features an ultra-high-resolution display system that packs 23 million pixels across two displays, and custom Apple silicon in a unique dual-chip design to ensure every experience feels like it’s taking place in front of the user’s eyes in real-time. Apple Vision Pro VR Headset transforms how people utilize their favorite apps, create and relive memories, enjoy amazing TV shows and movies, and FaceTime with others. It adds a new level of power to personal computing.

An infinite canvas for apps at work and home

The Apple Vision Pro mixed reality headset is visionOS features a three-dimensional interface that frees apps from the boundaries of a display so they can appear side by side at any scale. Apple Vision Pro enables users to be even more productive, with infinite screen real estate, access to their favorite apps, and all-new ways to multitask. And with support for Magic Keyboard and Magic Trackpad, users can set up the perfect workspace or bring the powerful capabilities of their Mac into Vision Pro wirelessly, creating an enormous, private, and portable 4K display with incredibly crisp text.

Engaging Entertainment Experiences

Apple Vision Pro can turn any room into a personal movie theater with two ultra-high-resolution screens, a screen that appears to be 100 feet wide, and a cutting-edge Spatial Audio system. Users have the option of watching movies, TV shows, or breathtaking three-dimensional films. Users of Apple Immersive Video get access to an intriguing selection of immersive videos that take them to brand-new locations and offer 180-degree high-resolution recordings with Spatial Audio. The Apple Vision Pro spatial computing makes new types of games possible with titles that can span a spectrum of immersion and bring gamers into all-new worlds. Users can also play over 100 Apple Arcade games on a screen as large as they want, with incredible immersive audio and support for popular game controllers.

Memories come Alive

With Apple Vision Pro, customers can record, revisit, and completely immerse themselves in their favorite moments thanks to Spatial Audio and the company's first three-dimensional camera. Every spatial image and video takes viewers back to a certain time, such as a party with friends or a memorable family reunion. On iCloud, users may access their full photo library and view their still images and moving pictures in life-size detail and vibrant color. Every iPhone panorama photo enlarges and wraps around the user, giving the impression that they are standing exactly where the photo was taken.

FaceTime Becomes Spatial

With Apple Vision Pro, FaceTime calls take advantage of the room around the user, with everyone on the call reflected in life-size tiles, as well as Spatial Audio, so it sounds as if participants are speaking right from where they are positioned. Users wearing Apple Vision Pro during a FaceTime call are reflected as a Persona — a digital representation of themselves created using Apple’s most advanced machine learning techniques — which reflects face and hand movements in real-time. Users can do things together like watch a movie, browse photos, or collaborate on a presentation.

Even more app experiences

The Apple Vision Pro has an all-new App Store where users can discover apps and content from developers, and access hundreds of thousands of familiar iPhone and iPad apps that run great and automatically work with the new input system for Vision Pro. Apple’s developer community can go even further and take advantage of the powerful and unique capabilities of Vision Pro and Vision to design brand-new app experiences and reimagine existing ones for spatial computing.

A Revolutionary Operating System and User Interface

VisionOS was created from the ground up to support the low-latency requirements of spatial computing, building on decades of engineering innovation in macOS, iOS, and iPadOS. The result is a ground-breaking operating system that offers strong spatial experiences that can benefit from the surroundings surrounding the user, opening up new possibilities at work and home. The three-dimensional interface in vision lets digital content appear and feel like it is physically present in the user's environment. It aids in the user's comprehension of scale and distance by creating shadows and reacting dynamically to natural light. Apple Vision Pro presents a whole new input system that is managed by a person's eyes, hands, and voice to enable user navigation and interaction with spatial content. Apps can be browsed through by merely looking at them, selecting with a tap, scrolling with a wrist flick, or speaking commands. Additionally, Apple Vision Pro comes with EyeSight, a ground-breaking breakthrough that enables users to keep in touch with those around them. Vision Pro feels transparent when worn, allowing the user to view approaching others while also showing their own eyes. EyeSight provides visual indications to others about what a user is focusing on when they are using an app or engrossed in an area.

Breakthrough Design

The Apple Vision Pro is the most advanced personal electronics device ever made. It builds on Apple's ingenuity and experience in building high-performance devices like the Mac, iPhone, and wearables like the Apple Watch. Apple made use of the most cutting-edge materials available to meet its lofty performance, mobility, and wearability requirements. The Apple Vision Pro is incredibly technologically advanced for such a small device. The optical surface that serves as a lens for the numerous cameras and sensors required to combine the real world with digital content is polished from a single piece of three-dimensional manufactured and laminated glass. The glass flows into the custom aluminum alloy frame that gently curves around the user’s face, while the modular system allows for a tailored fit to accommodate a wide range of people. The Light Seal is made of a soft textile, and comes in a range of shapes and sizes, flexing to conform to a user’s face for a precise fit. Flexible straps ensure audio remains close to the user’s ears, while a Head Band — available in multiple sizes — is three-dimensionally knitted as a single piece to provide cushioning, breathability, and stretch.1 The band is secured with a simple mechanism, making it easy to change to another size or style of the band.

Unrivaled Innovation in Hardware

The Apple Vision Pro is a wearable computer that offers exceptional computing capabilities in a small package. Vision Pro employs micro-OLED technology to cram 23 million pixels into two screens that are each the size of a postage stamp, each with wide color and great dynamic range. This ground-breaking system is constructed on top of an Apple silicon processor. Astonishing sensations are provided by this technical advance in combination with specially made catadioptric lenses, which provide amazing sharpness and clarity. ZEISS Optical Inserts will be used by users who need vision correction to guarantee visual fidelity and eye-tracking precision. The basis of the Apple Vision Pro experience is an innovative Spatial Audio system, which gives users the impression that sounds are emanating from their surroundings and adapts the sound to their environment. Two individually amplified drivers inside each audio pod deliver Personalized Spatial Audio based on the user’s own head and ear geometry. An advanced Spatial Audio system is core to the Apple Vision Pro experience, creating the feeling that sounds are coming from the environment around the user and matching the sound to the space. Two individually amplified drivers inside each audio pod deliver Personalized Spatial Audio based on the user’s own head and ear geometry. These groundbreaking innovations are powered by Apple silicon in a unique dual-chip design. M2 delivers unparalleled standalone performance, while the brand-new R1 chip processes input from 12 cameras, five sensors, and six microphones to ensure that content feels like it is appearing right in front of the user’s eyes, in real-time. R1 streams new images to the displays within 12 milliseconds — 8x faster than the blink of an eye. Apple Vision Pro is designed for all-day use when plugged in, and up to two hours of use with its external, high-performance battery.

Industry-Leading Privacy and Security

The Apple Vision Pro provides user control over their data and is built on a solid foundation of privacy and security. To rapidly unlock Apple Vision Pro, Optic ID, a new secure authentication technology, examines a user's iris under various invisible LED light exposures and compares it to the registered Optic ID data that is secured by the Secure Enclave. Optic ID data is never saved on Apple servers because it is completely encrypted, inaccessible to apps, and never leaves the user's device. While using Apple Vision Pro, the user's eye movement is kept private, and neither Apple nor any other third-party apps or websites receive eye-tracking data. Additionally, the system processes data from the camera and other sensors, so individual apps do not need to be able to see a user's surroundings to provide spatial experiences. Additionally, EyeSight has a visual signal that lets people know when a user is taking a spatial image or video.

full_description:
PICO 4 All-in-One 128GB VR Headset

The PICO 4 is powered by the Qualcomm XR2, a dedicated VR chipset with excellent performance and minimal latency. It has 8 cores, a 64-bit architecture, and a clock speed of 2.84 GHz. Advanced functions such as eye tracking, hand tracking, and voice control are also supported. It also offers 8GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, which is more than enough space for your favorite programs and media. A microSD card (not provided) can be used to expand the storage. The PICO 4 is compatible with Wi-Fi 6, the most recent wireless standard that provides better speeds and fewer interferences. You may access the internet, stream material, and share your virtual reality experience with others. It also supports Bluetooth 5.1, allowing you to pair compatible devices such as smartphones and tablets. The PICO 4's display is amazing, with a resolution of 4320 × 2160 pixels (2160 x 2160 each eye), which is higher than other VR headsets on the market. The display also boasts a refresh rate of 72/90Hz, which implies less motion sickness and smoother movements. The display is built on LCD technology, which produces brilliant colors while consuming little power. Pancake lenses, which are small and lightweight lenses that reduce distortion and expand the field of view, are used in the PICO 4. It offers a 105-degree field of view, which is larger than that of other VR headsets on the market. It also offers a seamless interpupillary distance adjustment, which allows you to tailor the distance between the lenses to your eyes. This increases both comfort and clarity. The PICO 4 boasts a 6DoF positioning system, which means it can track your head motions in all directions. VR allows you to move forward, backward, left, right, up, and down. The PICO 4 scans your surroundings and creates a virtual map using four cameras on the front of the headset.

LCD Display with Stereo Speakers

The PICO 4 has a magnificent display with a resolution of 4320 × 2160 pixels (2160 x 2160 each eye), which is higher than other VR headsets on the market. The display also boasts a refresh rate of 72/90Hz, which implies smoother movements and less motion sickness. full_description:
Apple Vision Pro 1TB Storage Spatial Computer VR Headset

The Apple Vision Pro is a new spatial computer that allows users to seamlessly merge digital material with the actual world while being present and socially engaged. Vision Pro provides a completely three-dimensional user interface that can be controlled by the user's hands, eyes, and voice—the most instinctive and natural inputs possible. This provides programs with an unlimited canvas that outperforms the capabilities of a standard display. Vision Pro, the first spatial operating system in history, allows users to interact with digital information as if it were physically present in their environment. The groundbreaking Vision Pro design incorporates bespoke Apple silicon in a novel dual-chip architecture, an ultra-high-resolution display system with 23 million pixels across two panels, 1TB internal storage, and other technologies that ensure every experience appears to be happening in front of the user's eyes in real time. The Apple Vision Pro VR Headset transforms the way people connect with their favorite apps, create and relive memories, watch fantastic TV shows and movies, and FaceTime with friends and family. It provides personal computers additional capabilities.

An infinite canvas for apps at work and home

The three-dimensional interface of the Apple Vision Pro mixed reality headset, which runs visionOS, enables applications to coexist at any size by freeing them from the constraints of a display. Apple Vision Pro gives customers boundless screen real estate, simple access to their favorite programs, and revolutionary multitasking features, allowing them to be even more productive. Users may also configure the appropriate workspace or wirelessly transfer the powerful power of their Mac into Vision Pro, resulting in a huge, private, and portable 4K display with extraordinarily fine writing, owing to compatibility with Magic Keyboard and Magic Trackpad.

Engaging Entertainment Experiences

With a screen that seems to be 100 feet wide, two incredibly high-resolution panels, and a cutting-edge Spatial Audio system, Apple Vision Pro can convert any area into a personal movie theater. Viewers may select from a variety of stunning three-dimensional videos, television shows, and movies. With 180-degree high-resolution recordings employing Spatial Audio, Apple Immersive Video viewers may discover a fascinating assortment of immersive videos that take them to other worlds.Spatial computing enables games that can transfer players to whole other worlds and immerse them at varying levels. Along with outstanding immersive audio and compatibility with well-known gaming controllers, customers may play over 100 Apple Arcade games on a screen as large as they like.

Memories come Alive

With Spatial Audio and the company's first three-dimensional camera, users of Apple Vision Pro may record, revisit, and completely immerse themselves in their favorite events. Each spatial image and video transports viewers back in time to a distinct experience, such as a joyful party with friends or a memorable family reunion. On iCloud, users can see both static and animated images in full-resolution, beautiful color, as well as access their entire photo collection. As the iPhone panoramic view enlarges and wraps around the subject, it appears like they are standing exactly where the photo was taken.

FaceTime Becomes Spatial

FaceTime discussions with Apple Vision Pro take use of the surrounding environment by displaying all participants' photos onto life-size tiles and employing Spatial Audio to imitate speakers speaking directly from their positions. When a user wears Vision Pro, their facial and hand movements are replicated in real time as a Persona, which is a digital representation of the person created using Apple's most advanced machine learning algorithms. Users can view a video, look at images, or collaborate on a presentation.

Even more app experiences

With the all-new Apple Vision Pro App Store, users may explore hundreds of thousands of well-known iPhone and iPad apps that function flawlessly and are preconfigured to operate with the device's new input mechanism. They can also discover apps and content created by developers. The developer community at Apple has the opportunity to leverage the exceptional powers of Vision Pro and vision to create whole new app experiences or reinvent old ones for spatial computing.

Breakthrough Design

The Apple Vision Pro is the most complex personal electronics device ever developed. It builds on Apple's innovation and experience by developing high-performance devices such as the Mac, iPhone, and wearables such as the Apple Watch. Apple employed the most sophisticated materials on the market to meet its stringent requirements for wearability, mobility, and performance. For such a little device, the Apple Vision Pro offers incredibly advanced technological capabilities. One piece of three-dimensionally produced and laminated glass is polished to serve as the optical surface, acting as a lens for all of the cameras and sensors required to merge the real world with digital content.The modular system enables for a tailored fit for a wide range of users, as well as the glass to flow into the handmade aluminum alloy frame that delicately bends over the user's face. The Light Seal bends to fit a user's face exactly since it is made of a flexible textile and comes in a range of sizes and shapes. While the Head Band, available in a variety of sizes, is three-dimensionally knit as a single piece to provide cushioning, breathability, and elasticity, flexible straps ensure that the music remains close to the user's ears.1. Because the band is fastened using a simple mechanism, changing sizes or types is simple.

A Revolutionary Operating System and User Interface

Constructed from the ground up, VisionOS builds on decades of technical innovation in macOS, iOS, and iPadOS to satisfy the low-latency requirements of spatial computing. The outcome is a revolutionary operating system that provides powerful spatial experiences and can take use of the environment around the user, creating new opportunities both at work and at home. Digital material may seem and feel like it is physically present in the user's surroundings because to visionOS's three-dimensional interface. By casting shadows and responding dynamically to ambient light, it helps the user understand scale and distance. With Apple Vision Pro, users may navigate and interact with spatial material using a whole new input method controlled by their hands, eyes, and voices. You can navigate across apps by just looking at them, tapping to choose, flicking your wrist to scroll, or even voicing instructions. Furthermore, Apple Vision Pro includes EyeSight, a revolutionary innovation that lets users stay in contact with people around. When worn, Vision Pro seems transparent and lets the user see people coming while still revealing their own eyes. When a user is absorbed in a task or utilizing an app, EyeSight shows other people what they are visually concentrating on.

Unrivaled Innovation in Hardware

The Apple Vision Pro is a wearable computer that packs impressive processing power into a small form factor. Vision Pro uses micro-OLED technology to squeeze 23 million pixels—each with a rich color gamut and great dynamic range—into two postage stamp-sized screens. This breakthrough technique is based on Apple's silicon processor. This technical development, paired with specially developed catadioptric lenses that provide exceptional sharpness and clarity, results in breathtaking experiences. Users in need of vision correction will need ZEISS Optical Inserts to ensure accurate eye tracking and visual fidelity. The Apple Vision Pro experience is built around innovative Spatial Audio technology that gives users the impression that sounds are coming from their surroundings and adapts the sound to their environment. Each audio pod has two independently amplified drivers that offer personalized spatial music based on the user's head and ear geometry. The core of the Apple Vision Pro experience is a revolutionary Spatial Audio system that mixes sound into the space and creates the illusion that sounds are coming from the surroundings. Each audio pod has two independently amplified drivers that offer personalized spatial music based on the user's head and ear geometry. Apple silicon drives these groundbreaking breakthroughs in a unique dual-chip design. While the all-new R1 chip handles information from 12 cameras, five sensors, and six microphones to guarantee that material seems like it is appearing directly in front of the user's eyes, in real time, the M2 offers unmatched standalone performance. R1 transmits fresh visuals to the screens in under 12 milliseconds, which is eight times quicker than an eyeblink. With its external, high-performance battery, Apple Vision Pro may be used for up to two hours and is meant to be used continuously when plugged in.

Industry-Leading Privacy and Security

The Apple Vision Pro is built on a solid foundation of security and privacy, providing customers full control over their data. To swiftly launch Apple Vision Pro, Optic ID, a new secure identification method, examines a user's iris under various invisible LED light exposures and compares it to previously stored Optic ID data secured by the Secure Enclave. Because Optic ID data is completely encrypted, inaccessible to programs, and never leaves the user's device, it is never saved on Apple servers. Apple Vision Pro safeguards the privacy of the user's eye movements by not sharing eye tracking data with other apps or websites. Furthermore, individual apps can give spatial experiences without requiring the user to be able to view their surroundings since the system interprets data from the camera and other sensors. A visual signal included in EyeSight also alerts observers when a user is capturing a spatial picture or video.

The PICO 4 has a magnificent display with a resolution of 4320 × 2160 pixels (2160 x 2160 each eye), which is higher than other VR headsets on the market. Advanced Tracking and Optics Technology

The PICO 4 features a 6DoF positioning mechanism that can monitor your head motions in all directions. VR allows you to move forward, backward, left, right, up, and down. The PICO 4 has 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, which is enough of room for your favorite apps and media. A microSD card can also be utilized to increase storage space.

Fast and Reliable Wireless Connections

You may connect to the internet, watch videos, and share your virtual reality experience with others. The PICO 4 also supports Bluetooth 5.1, which allows you to connect to Bluetooth-enabled devices including headphones, keyboards, and controllers.

Long-lasting and Fast-charging Battery

The PICO 4 has a large 5300 mAh battery that can run continuously for up to three hours. The battery may also be swiftly charged with the included 20W fast charger, which satisfies QC 3.0 / PD 3.0 standards.
